venice.hub.utils

Class TTEBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<venice.lib.parser.SlotEvent>
          • venice.hub.utils.TTEBuffer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<venice.lib.parser.SlotEvent>, java.util.Collection<venice.lib.parser.SlotEvent>, java.util.List<venice.lib.parser.SlotEvent>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class TTEBuffer
extends java.util.ArrayList<venice.lib.parser.SlotEvent>
    A buffer for TTE objects with random access, to enable fast seeking in log files. The TTEBufferedReader fills it with data from disk, writing this data on top, the DiskReader reads data from a position that could be anywhere (normally the DiskReader is reading slower than the TTEBufferedReader is filling)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstTimestamp

        public long getFirstTimestamp()
        Gets the timestamp of the first event in the buffer of the disk reader. If the buffer is empty, 0 is returned.
        Returns:
        timestamp of first event in buffer, or 0 if the buffer is empty

      • getLastTimestamp

        public long getLastTimestamp()
        Gets the timestamp of the last event in the buffer of the disk reader. If the buffer is empty, 0 is returned.
        Returns:
        timestamp of last event in buffer, or 0 if the buffer is empty

      • removeUntil

        public int removeUntil(long timestamp)
        Removes all items with timestamp equal or less than the given timestamp.
        Parameters:
        timestamp -
        Returns:
        the number of removed items

        public int getReadingPosition()

        Sets the reading position inside of the buffer.

      • addReadingPosition

        public void addReadingPosition(int delta)
        Add a value to the reading position.
        Parameters:
        delta - the value to be added to the reading position

      • getNext

        public venice.lib.parser.SlotEvent getNext()
        A reader uses this method to demand a new TTE item. It will get null, when there is no TTE item available.
        Returns:
        TTE object or null if there is no TTE available.

      • peek

        public venice.lib.parser.SlotEvent peek()
        Peeking if there is an slotEvent available at the reading position, without removing it. If there is no slotEvent available, null will be returned instead.
        Returns:
        slotEvent available at the reading position; null if there is no slotEvent
